skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

skill.author: Anthropic

security_audit.summary: This is an official Anthropic skill containing only documentation and guidelines. No executable code, external dependencies, or security concerns identified.

content.value_statement: Generates production-ready, visually distinctive web interfaces with bold aesthetic choices that avoid generic AI-generated design patterns.
actual_capabilities: Builds React, Vue, and other framework components
Designs distinctive typography systems with unique font pairings
Implements cohesive color schemes using CSS variables
Adds animations and micro-interactions using CSS and Motion libraries
Creates unconventional layouts with asymmetry and spatial composition
Applies visual effects like gradients, textures, shadows, and overlays
Generates accessible, functional interfaces that avoid generic aesthetics
limitations: Focuses on frontend code only, not backend functionality
Requires clear context about purpose and audience for best results
May need user guidance on technical constraints (framework, performance)
Design boldness depends on user's willingness to embrace unconventional choices

use_cases.title: Landing Page Creation
use_cases.description: Build visually striking landing pages with unique aesthetics that stand out from template-based designs
use_cases.target_user: Marketers, startup founders, designers seeking production-ready code

use_cases.title: Dashboard UI Development
use_cases.description: Create functional dashboards with distinctive visual identity beyond standard admin templates
use_cases.target_user: Product teams, developers building internal tools or SaaS products

use_cases.title: Component Library Building
use_cases.description: Design and implement reusable React/Vue components with cohesive aesthetic systems

use_cases.title: Portfolio Website Design
use_cases.description: Craft memorable portfolio sites with bold typography, animations, and unique layouts
use_cases.target_user: Designers, creatives, freelancers showcasing their work

use_cases.title: Web Application Styling
use_cases.description: Transform existing applications with refined aesthetics and polished interactions
use_cases.target_user: Developers looking to elevate their app's visual design

prompt_templates.title: Landing Page with Specific Aesthetic
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a landing page for [product/service] targeting [audience]. Use a [brutalist/retro-futuristic/luxury/playful] aesthetic with [specific color preference]. The page should convey [brand message/feeling].
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have a clear brand direction and want a distinctive landing page

prompt_templates.title: React Component with Animation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a React component for [feature description] with smooth animations and micro-interactions. Use [framework preference] and make it feel [modern/playful/professional].
prompt_templates.scenario: Building interactive UI components with motion design

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard Interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a dashboard for [use case] showing [data types]. Avoid generic admin templates - make it visually distinctive with [aesthetic direction]. Include charts, tables, and key metrics.
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating data visualization interfaces with personality

prompt_templates.title: Portfolio Page
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a portfolio page showcasing [type of work]. Use asymmetric layout, unexpected typography, and [light/dark] theme. Make it memorable and avoid common portfolio patterns.
prompt_templates.scenario: Crafting unique personal or professional portfolios

prompt_templates.title: Beautify Existing UI
prompt_templates.prompt: Take this [existing code/design] and transform it with a [aesthetic direction] approach. Keep the functionality but elevate the visual design with better typography, colors, spacing, and effects.
prompt_templates.scenario: Improving existing interfaces with better aesthetics

output_examples.input: Create a landing page for an AI writing tool with a brutalist aesthetic
output_examples.output: Production HTML/CSS/JS with stark typography (e.g., Helvetica Neue Bold), high contrast black/white palette, raw geometric layouts, prominent borders, minimal animations, and intentionally unpolished aesthetic that conveys technical power

output_examples.input: Build a React dashboard for fitness tracking with a playful, toy-like feel
output_examples.output: React component code with rounded shapes, vibrant color palette (CSS variables), bouncy animations using Framer Motion, custom illustrated icons, playful font pairing (display + friendly body font), and delightful micro-interactions on data updates

best_practices: Always choose a clear aesthetic direction before coding (minimal, maximal, retro, luxury, etc.)
Use distinctive fonts - avoid Inter, Roboto, Arial, and system defaults
Commit to cohesive color systems using CSS variables
Match implementation complexity to aesthetic vision (elaborate code for maximalist designs, precision for minimalist)
Focus animations on high-impact moments rather than scattered micro-interactions
Create visual depth with backgrounds, textures, and effects rather than flat solid colors
Ensure accessibility while maintaining distinctive aesthetics
Break conventional layouts with asymmetry, overlap, or diagonal flow when appropriate
anti_patterns: Using generic font combinations like Inter, Roboto, or system fonts
Defaulting to purple gradients on white backgrounds
Creating cookie-cutter designs without context-specific character
Reusing the same aesthetic choices (like Space Grotesk) across different projects
Building timid, evenly-distributed color palettes instead of dominant colors with accents
Implementing weak or scattered animations instead of orchestrated experiences
Settling for predictable layouts and component patterns
Holding back on creative choices due to fear of being unconventional

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill can generate code for HTML/CSS/JavaScript, React, Vue, and other modern frontend frameworks. Specify your preference in the prompt for best results.

faq.question: How do I ensure the design matches my brand?
faq.answer: Provide context about your product, audience, and desired tone/aesthetic direction. The more specific you are about the feeling or style you want, the better the output will match your vision.

faq.question: Will the code be production-ready?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill generates functional, production-grade code with proper structure, accessibility considerations, and performance in mind.

faq.question: Can I request specific design elements or constraints?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Specify technical constraints (framework, performance needs), required features, accessibility requirements, or specific visual elements you want included.

faq.question: What if I want a minimal design instead of bold/maximal?
faq.answer: The skill supports both extremes. Minimalism requires precision and restraint in code - careful spacing, typography, and subtle details. Specify your preference for refined minimalism in your prompt.

faq.question: How does this avoid generic AI aesthetics?
faq.answer: The skill actively avoids common AI design patterns by choosing distinctive fonts, creating context-specific designs, using varied aesthetics across generations, and making intentional creative choices rather than defaulting to safe options.
